name: Order Up!!!
description:
Hi . To start playing you must click on screen and push A key on your keyboard. If you haven't played any games like this, don't worry I have a hint for you: balls in the bottom are somehow connected to pipes. You move right with D key and you add ingredients with S key on keyboard. Your only goal is to fill that bowl with the recipe below.

BTW this game and game engine is made for LCD Jam (https://itch.io/jam/lcd-jam) and it's written in pure Javascript.

Game screen is 160x144 PX ( Gameoboi screen size)
